participant_1.background:
I'm a survivor and I'm dedicated to my passions.
when i have nothing else to do , i read books.
I am a writer who uses my travels as inspiration for my work.
I'm the one always tripping over my own two feet while running track.
i love to go to the lake.

participant_2.background:
I love to drive and dress up, but I get sad when I think about my dog.
i play basketball.
My ideal home would have a yard big enough for my dog and cat to run around in.
I don't know much about my parents.
i am a widow.

content.text: Hello, how are you?
Fine, thank you. How about you?
I am doing well. I am a writer who uses my travels as inspiration for my work.
That sounds like an interesting job. Do you travel a lot?
I do, I love to explore different places. I just got back from a trip to the lake.
That sounds nice. I love going to the lake too. I like to swim and play basketball.
I love swimming too. I am not very good at basketball, but I enjoy playing it.
That's okay, I'm not very good either. I just like to have fun.
Me too. I think it's important to have fun in life.
I agree. What kind of books do you write?
I write all sorts of books, but I mostly write fiction.
That's great. I love reading fiction.
What are some of your favorite books?
I like all kinds of books, but I especially like historical fiction and mysteries.
Those are both great genres. I love historical fiction too.
I know! It's so interesting to learn about different time periods.
Me too. I think it's important to learn about the past so we can understand the present.
I agree. That's why I like to read historical fiction. It helps me to understand the world around me.
Me too. I think it's important to be informed.
I agree.
